```python
import random

class WastelandAdventure:
    def __init__(self):
        self.characters = {
            "Strong Human": {"health": 150, "buffs": {"Strength": 2, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 8},
            "Agile Scout": {"health": 120, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 2, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 6},
            "Intelligent Engineer": {"health": 130, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 2, "Engineering": 1}, "inventory_size": 7},
            "Mysterious Medic": {"health": 140, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 1, "Engineering": 2}, "inventory_size": 7}
        }
        self.character = None
        self.health = 0
        self.inventory = []
        self.buffs = {}
        self.ammo = {"Pistol": 0, "Assault Rifle": 0, "Plasma Rifle": 0}
        self.weapons = ["Knife (Basic Weapon)", "Pistol (Medium Weapon)", "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)", "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"]
        self.creatures = [
            {"name": "Small Bug", "damage": 5, "image": "Small Bug image"},
            {"name": "Medium Bug", "damage": 10, "image": "Medium Bug image"},
            {"name": "Large Bug", "damage": 15, "image": "Large Bug image"},
            {"name": "Gatordillo", "damage": 20, "image": "Gatordillo image"},
            {"name": "Feral Ghoul", "damage": 15, "image": "Feral Ghoul image"},
            {"name": "Small Raider", "damage": 10, "image": "Small Raider image"},
            {"name": "Medium Raider", "damage": 15, "image": "Medium Raider image"},
            {"name": "Large Raider", "damage": 20, "image": "Large Raider image"}
        ]
        self.bosses = [
            {"name": "Weedling", "health": 50, "damage": 25, "image": "Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Corrupted Weedling", "health": 75, "damage": 30, "image": "Corrupted Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Glowing King Weed", "health": 125, "damage": 35, "image": "Glowing King Weed image"}
        ]
        self.encounter_count = 0
        self.used_creatures = []

    def choose_character(self):
        options = list(self.characters.keys()) + ["Exit to Beginning"]
        self.character = random.choice(options)
        if self.character == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        self.health = self.characters[self.character]["health"]
        self.buffs = self.characters[self.character]["buffs"].copy()
        return True

    def choose_option(self, options, prompt=""):
        if "Exit to Beginning" not in options:
            options.append("Exit to Beginning")
        choice = random.choice(options)
        if choice == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        return choice

    def bid_on_pull_box(self):
        options = ["Basic", "Premium", "Deluxe", "Ultimate"]
        box = self.choose_option(options)
        if not box:
            return False
        items = {
            "Basic": [
                "Small Health Pack (restores 5 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+1)",
                "Agility Booster (+1)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+1)",
                "Engineering Booster (+1)",
                "Knife (Basic Weapon)"
            ],
            "Premium": [
                "Medium Health Pack (restores 10 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+2)",
                "Agility Booster (+2)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+2)",
                "Engineering Booster (+2)",
                "Small Critical Hit Amulet (10% chance for double damage)",
                "Pistol (Medium Weapon)"
            ],
            "Deluxe": [
                "Large Health Pack (restores 15 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+3)",
                "Agility Booster (+3)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+3)",
                "Engineering Booster (+3)",
                "Large Critical Hit Amulet (15% chance for double damage)",
                "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)"
            ],
            "Ultimate": [
                "Extra-Large Health Pack (restores 20 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+4)",
                "Agility Booster (+4)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+4)",
                "Engineering Booster (+4)",
                "Epic Critical Hit Amulet (20% chance for double damage)",
                "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"
            ]
        }
        box_items = items[box]
        while True:
            add_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if add_item == "No" or not add_item:
                break
            item = self.choose_option(box_items)
            if not item:
                break
            if item in self.weapons and item in self.inventory:
                continue
            if item in self.weapons:
                weapon_type = item.split()[0]
                if weapon_type == "Knife":
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] = float('inf')  # Knife has infinite ammo
                else:
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] += 1  # Each weapon starts with 1 ammo
            self.inventory.append(item)
            box_items.remove(item)
        return True

    def drop_ammo(self):
        ammo_types = ["Pistol", "Assault Rifle", "Plasma Rifle"]
        ammo_dropped = random.choice(ammo_types)
        ammo_amount = random.randint(1, 10)
        self.ammo[ammo_dropped] += ammo_amount

    def encounter_creature(self):
        self.encounter_count += 1
        if not self.creatures:
            self.creatures = self.used_creatures
            self.used_creatures = []
        creature = random.choice(self.creatures)
        self.creatures.remove(creature)
        self.used_creatures.append(creature)
        return self.combat(creature, rolls_limit=3)

    def encounter_boss(self):
        if not self.bosses:
            return False
        boss = self.bosses.pop(0)
        self.encounter_count = 0  # Reset encounter count after each boss
        rolls_limit = 4 if boss["name"] != "Glowing King Weed" else 5
        return self.boss_combat(boss, rolls_limit)

    def combat(self, creature, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            creature_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > creature_roll:
                damage = player_roll - creature_roll
                creature["damage"] -= damage

            if creature["damage"] <= 0:
                return True

            creature_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense_roll = random.randint(1, 20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if creature_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = creature_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def boss_combat(self, boss, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            boss_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > boss_roll:
                damage = player_roll - boss_roll
                boss["health"] -= damage

            if boss["health"] <= 0:
                return True

            boss_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense_roll = random.randint(1, 

[2024-06-01 12:48:40] ChatGPT:
20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if boss_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = boss_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def apply_item_effect(self, item):
        if "Health Pack" in item:
            health_values = {"Small": 5, "Medium": 10, "Large": 15, "Extra-Large": 20}
            health_restored = health_values[item.split()[0]]
            self.health += health_restored
        elif "Booster" in item:
            stat_boost = int(item.split('(')[1].split('+')[1].split(')')[0])
            stat_type = item.split()[0]
            self.buffs[stat_type] += stat_boost
        elif "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
            pass  # Single-use item effect handled during roll

    def start_game(self):
        while True:
            if not self.choose_character():
                continue
            while True:
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                print("Congratulations! You have defeated all bosses and survived the wasteland!")
                break

# To start the game

game.start_game()
```

```python
def run_tests():
    results = []
    for _ in range(1000):
        game = WastelandAdventure()
        try:
            game.start_game()
            results.append("Success")
        except Exception as e:
            results.append(f"Error: {str(e)}")
    success_count = results.count("Success")
    error_count = len(results) - success_count
    return {"Success": success_count, "Error": error_count}

# Run the tests in the background
test_results = run_tests()
```

```python
class WastelandAdventure:
    def __init__(self):
        self.characters = {

        }
        self.character = None
        self.health = 0
        self.inventory = []

        self.ammo = {"Pistol": 0, "Assault Rifle": 0, "Plasma Rifle": 0}
        self.weapons = ["Knife (Basic Weapon)", "Pistol (Medium Weapon)", "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)", "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"]

            {"name": "Feral Ghoul", "damage": 15, "image": "Feral Ghoul image"},
            {"name": "Small Raider", "damage": 10, "image": "Small Raider image"},
            {"name": "Medium Raider", "damage": 15, "image": "Medium Raider image"},
            {"name": "Large Raider", "damage": 20, "image": "Large Raider image"}
        ]
        self.bosses = [
            {"name": "Weedling", "health": 50, "damage": 25, "image": "Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Corrupted Weedling", "health": 75, "damage": 30, "image": "Corrupted Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Glowing King Weed", "health": 125, "damage": 35, "image": "Glowing King Weed image"}
        ]
        self.encounter_count = 0
        self.used_creatures = []

    def choose_character(self):
        options = list(self.characters.keys()) + ["Exit to Beginning"]
        self.character = random.choice(options)
        if self.character == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        self.health = self.characters[self.character]["health"]
        self.buffs = self.characters[self.character]["buffs"].copy()
        return True

    def choose_option(self, options, prompt=""):
        if "Exit to Beginning" not in options:
            options.append("Exit to Beginning")
        choice = random.choice(options)
        if choice == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        return choice

    def bid_on_pull_box(self):
        options = ["Basic", "Premium", "Deluxe", "Ultimate"]
        box = self.choose_option(options)
        if not box:
            return False
        items = {
            "Basic": [
                "Small Health Pack (restores 5 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+1)",
                "Agility Booster (+1)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+1)",
                "Engineering Booster (+1)",
                "Knife (Basic Weapon)"
            ],
            "Premium": [
                "Medium Health Pack (restores 10 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+2)",
                "Agility Booster (+2)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+2)",
                "Engineering Booster (+2)",
                "Small Critical Hit Amulet (10% chance for double damage)",
                "Pistol (Medium Weapon)"
            ],
            "Deluxe": [
                "Large Health Pack (restores 15 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+3)",
                "Agility Booster (+3)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+3)",
                "Engineering Booster (+3)",
                "Large Critical Hit Amulet (15% chance for double damage)",
                "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)"
            ],
            "Ultimate": [
                "Extra-Large Health Pack (restores 20 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+4)",
                "Agility Booster (+4)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+4)",
                "Engineering Booster (+4)",
                "Epic Critical Hit Amulet (20% chance for double damage)",
                "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"
            ]
        }
        box_items = items[box]
        while True:
            add_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if add_item == "No" or not add_item:
                break
            item = self.choose_option(box_items)
            if not item:
                break
            if item in self.weapons and item in self.inventory:
                continue
            if item in self.weapons:
                weapon_type = item.split()[0]
                if weapon_type == "Knife":
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] = float('inf')  # Knife has infinite ammo
                else:
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] += 1  # Each weapon starts with 1 ammo
            self.inventory.append(item)
            box_items.remove(item)
        return True

    def drop_ammo(self):
        ammo_types = ["Pistol", "Assault Rifle", "Plasma Rifle"]
        ammo_dropped = random.choice(ammo_types)
        ammo_amount = random.randint(1, 10)
        self.ammo[ammo_dropped] += ammo_amount

    def encounter_creature(self):
        self.encounter_count += 1
        if not self.creatures:
            self.creatures = self.used_creatures
            self.used_creatures = []
        creature = random.choice(self.creatures)
        self.creatures.remove(creature)
        self.used_creatures.append(creature)
        return self.combat(creature, rolls_limit=3)

    def encounter_boss(self):
        if not self.bosses:
            return False
        boss = self.bosses.pop(0)
        self.encounter_count = 0  # Reset encounter count after each boss
        rolls_limit = 4 if boss["name"] != "Glowing King Weed" else 5
        return self.boss_combat(boss, rolls_limit)

    def combat(self, creature, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            creature_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > creature_roll:
                damage = player_roll - creature_roll
                creature["damage"] -= damage

            if creature["damage"] <= 0:
                return True

            creature_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense_roll = random.randint(1, 20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if creature_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = creature_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def boss_combat(self, boss, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            boss_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > boss_roll:
                damage = player_roll - boss_roll
                boss["health"] -= damage

            if boss["health"] <= 0:
                return True

            boss_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense

[2024-06-01 12:56:38] ChatGPT:
_roll = random.randint(1, 20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if boss_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = boss_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def apply_item_effect(self, item):
        if "Health Pack" in item:
            health_values = {"Small": 5, "Medium": 10, "Large": 15, "Extra-Large": 20}
            health_restored = health_values[item.split()[0]]
            self.health += health_restored
        elif "Booster" in item:
            stat_boost = int(item.split('(')[1].split('+')[1].split(')')[0])
            stat_type = item.split()[0]
            self.buffs[stat_type] += stat_boost
        elif "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
            pass  # Single-use item effect handled during roll

    def start_game(self):
        while True:
            if not self.choose_character():
                continue
            while True:
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                print("Congratulations! You have defeated all bosses and survived the wasteland!")
                break

def run_tests():
    results = []
    for _ in range(1000):
        game = WastelandAdventure()
        try:
            game.start_game()
            results.append("Success")
        except Exception as e:
            results.append(f"Error: {str(e)}")
    success_count = results.count("Success")
    error_count = len(results) - success_count
    return {"Success": success_count, "Error": error_count}

# Run the tests in the background
test_results = run_tests()
test_results
```

```python
import random

class WastelandAdventure:
    def __init__(self):
        self.characters = {
            "Strong Human": {"health": 150, "buffs": {"Strength": 2, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 8},
            "Agile Scout": {"health": 120, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 2, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 6},
            "Intelligent Engineer": {"health": 130, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 2, "Engineering": 1}, "inventory_size": 7},

        self.health = 0
        self.inventory = []

        self.encounter_count = 0
        self.used_creatures = []

    def choose_character(self):
        options = list(self.characters.keys()) + ["Exit to Beginning"]
        self.character = random.choice(options)
        if self.character == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        self.health = self.characters[self.character]["health"]
        self.buffs = self.characters[self.character]["buffs"].copy()
        return True

    def choose_option(self, options, prompt=""):
        if "Exit to Beginning" not in options:
            options.append("Exit to Beginning")
        choice = random.choice(options)
        if choice == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        return choice
```

```python
            add_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if add_item == "No" or not add_item:
                break
            item = self.choose_option(box_items)
            if not item:
                break
            if item in self.weapons and item in self.inventory:
                continue
            if item in self.weapons:
                weapon_type = item.split()[0]
                if weapon_type == "Knife":
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] = float('inf')  # Knife has infinite ammo
                else:
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] += 1  # Each weapon starts with 1 ammo
            self.inventory.append(item)
            box_items.remove(item)
        return True

    def drop_ammo(self):
        ammo_types = ["Pistol", "Assault Rifle", "Plasma Rifle"]
        ammo_dropped = random.choice(ammo_types)
        ammo_amount = random.randint(1, 10)
        self.ammo[ammo_dropped] += ammo_amount

    def encounter_creature(self):
        self.encounter_count += 1
        if not self.creatures:
            self.creatures = self.used_creatures
            self.used_creatures = []
        creature = random.choice(self.creatures)
        self.creatures.remove(creature)
        self.used_creatures.append(creature)
        return self.combat(creature, rolls_limit=3)

    def encounter_boss(self):
        if not self.bosses:
            return False
        boss = self.bosses.pop(0)
        self.encounter_count = 0  # Reset encounter count after each boss
        rolls_limit = 4 if boss["name"] != "Glowing King Weed" else 5
        return self.boss_combat(boss, rolls_limit)

    def combat(self, creature, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            creature_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > creature_roll:
                damage = player_roll - creature_roll
                creature["damage"] -= damage

            if creature["damage"] <= 0:
                return True

            creature_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense_roll = random.randint(1, 20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if creature_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = creature_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def boss_combat(self, boss, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            boss_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > boss_roll:
                damage = player_roll - boss_roll
                boss["health"] -= damage

            if boss["health"] <= 0:
                return True

            boss_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)


[2024-06-01 13:00:07] ChatGPT:

            if boss_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = boss_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def apply_item_effect(self, item):
        if "Health Pack" in item:
            health_values = {"Small": 5, "Medium": 10, "Large": 15, "Extra-Large": 20}
            health_restored = health_values[item.split()[0]]
            self.health += health_restored
        elif "Booster" in item:
            stat_boost = int(item.split('(')[1].split('+')[1].split(')')[0])
            stat_type = item.split()[0]
            self.buffs[stat_type] += stat_boost
        elif "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
            pass  # Single-use item effect handled during roll

    def start_game(self):
        while True:
            if not self.choose_character():
                continue
            while True:
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break

                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():

                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():

                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():

                if not self.encounter_creature():

                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():

                if not self.encounter_boss():

                    break

                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():

                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():

                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                print("Congratulations! You have defeated all bosses and survived the wasteland!")
                break

def run_tests():
    results = []
    for _ in range(1000):
        game = WastelandAdventure()
        try:
            game.start_game()
            results.append("Success")
        except Exception as e:
            results.append(f"Error: {str(e)}")
    success_count = results.count("Success")
    error_count = len(results) - success_count
    return {"Success": success_count, "Error": error_count}

# Run the tests in the background
test_results = run_tests()
```

```python
import random
from tqdm import tqdm

class WastelandAdventure:
    def __init__(self):
        self.characters = {
            "Strong Human": {"health": 150, "buffs": {"Strength": 2, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 8},
            "Agile Scout": {"health": 120, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 2, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 6},
            "Intelligent Engineer": {"health": 130, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 2, "Engineering": 1}, "inventory_size": 7},
            "Mysterious Medic": {"health": 140, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 1, "Engineering": 2}, "inventory_size": 7}
        }
        self.character = None
        self.health = 0
        self.inventory = []
        self.buffs = {}
        self.ammo = {"Pistol": 0, "Assault Rifle": 0, "Plasma Rifle": 0}
        self.weapons = ["Knife (Basic Weapon)", "Pistol (Medium Weapon)", "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)", "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"]
        self.creatures = [
            {"name": "Small Bug", "damage": 5, "image": "Small Bug image"},
            {"name": "Medium Bug", "damage": 10, "image": "Medium Bug image"},
            {"name": "Large Bug", "damage": 15, "image": "Large Bug image"},
            {"name": "Gatordillo", "damage": 20, "image": "Gatordillo image"},
            {"name": "Feral Ghoul", "damage": 15, "image": "Feral Ghoul image"},
            {"name": "Small Raider", "damage": 10, "image": "Small Raider image"},
            {"name": "Medium Raider", "damage": 15, "image": "Medium Raider image"},
            {"name": "Large Raider", "damage": 20, "image": "Large Raider image"}
        ]
        self.bosses = [
            {"name": "Weedling", "health": 50, "damage": 25, "image": "Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Corrupted Weedling", "health": 75, "damage": 30, "image": "Corrupted Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Glowing King Weed", "health": 125, "damage": 35, "image": "Glowing King Weed image"}
        ]
        self.encounter_count = 0
        self.used_creatures = []

    def choose_character(self):
        options = list(self.characters.keys()) + ["Exit to Beginning"]
        self.character = random.choice(options)
        if self.character == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        self.health = self.characters[self.character]["health"]
        self.buffs = self.characters[self.character]["buffs"].copy()
        return True

    def choose_option(self, options, prompt=""):
        if "Exit to Beginning" not in options:
            options.append("Exit to Beginning")
        choice = random.choice(options)
        if choice == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        return choice

    def bid_on_pull_box(self):
        options = ["Basic", "Premium", "Deluxe", "Ultimate"]
        box = self.choose_option(options)
        if not box:
            return False
        items = {
            "Basic": [
                "Small Health Pack (restores 5 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+1)",
                "Agility Booster (+1)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+1)",
                "Engineering Booster (+1)",
                "Knife (Basic Weapon)"
            ],
            "Premium": [
                "Medium Health Pack (restores 10 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+2)",
                "Agility Booster (+2)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+2)",
                "Engineering Booster (+2)",
                "Small Critical Hit Amulet (10% chance for double damage)",
                "Pistol (Medium Weapon)"
            ],
            "Deluxe": [
                "Large Health Pack (restores 15 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+3)",
                "Agility Booster (+3)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+3)",
                "Engineering Booster (+3)",
                "Large Critical Hit Amulet (15% chance for double damage)",
                "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)"
            ],
            "Ultimate": [
                "Extra-Large Health Pack (restores 20 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+4)",
                "Agility Booster (+4)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+4)",
                "Engineering Booster (+4)",
                "Epic Critical Hit Amulet (20% chance for double damage)",
                "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"
            ]
        }
        box_items = items[box]
        while True:
            add_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if add_item == "No" or not add_item:
                break
            item = self.choose_option(box_items)
            if not item:
                break
            if item in self.weapons and item in self.inventory:
                continue
            if item in self.weapons:
                weapon_type = item.split()[0]
                if weapon_type == "Knife":
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] = float('inf')  # Knife has infinite ammo
                else:
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] += 1  # Each weapon starts with 1 ammo
            self.inventory.append(item)
            box_items.remove(item)
        return True

    def drop_ammo(self):
        ammo_types = ["Pistol", "Assault Rifle", "Plasma Rifle"]
        ammo_dropped = random.choice(ammo_types)
        ammo_amount = random.randint(1, 10)
        self.ammo[ammo_dropped] += ammo_amount

    def encounter_creature(self):
        self.encounter_count += 1
        if not self.creatures:
            self.creatures = self.used_creatures
            self.used_creatures = []
        creature = random.choice(self.creatures)
        self.creatures.remove(creature)
        self.used_creatures.append(creature)
        return self.combat(creature, rolls_limit=3)

    def encounter_boss(self):
        if not self.bosses:
            return False
        boss = self.bosses.pop(0)
        self.encounter_count = 0  # Reset encounter count after each boss
        rolls_limit = 4 if boss["name"] != "Glowing King Weed" else 5
        return self.boss_combat(boss, rolls_limit)

    def combat(self, creature, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            creature_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > creature_roll:
                damage = player_roll - creature_roll
                creature["damage"] -= damage

            if creature["damage"] <= 0:
                return True

            creature_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense_roll = random.randint(1, 20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if creature_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = creature_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True
```

```python
import random
from tqdm import tqdm

class WastelandAdventure:
    def __init__(self):
        self.characters = {
            "Strong Human": {"health": 150, "buffs": {"Strength": 2, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 8},
            "Agile Scout": {"health": 120, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 2, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 6},
            "Intelligent Engineer": {"health": 130, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 2, "Engineering": 1}, "inventory_size": 7},
            "Mysterious Medic": {"health": 140, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 1, "Engineering": 2}, "inventory_size": 7}
        }
        self.character = None
        self.health = 0
        self.inventory = []
        self.buffs = {}
        self.ammo = {"Pistol": 0, "Assault Rifle": 0, "Plasma Rifle": 0}
        self.weapons = ["Knife (Basic Weapon)", "Pistol (Medium Weapon)", "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)", "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"]
        self.creatures = [
            {"name": "Small Bug", "damage": 5, "image": "Small Bug image"},
            {"name": "Medium Bug", "damage": 10, "image": "Medium Bug image"},
            {"name": "Large Bug", "damage": 15, "image": "Large Bug image"},
            {"name": "Gatordillo", "damage": 20, "image": "Gatordillo image"},
            {"name": "Feral Ghoul", "damage": 15, "image": "Feral Ghoul image"},
            {"name": "Small Raider", "damage": 10, "image": "Small Raider image"},
            {"name": "Medium Raider", "damage": 15, "image": "Medium Raider image"},
            {"name": "Large Raider", "damage": 20, "image": "Large Raider image"}
        ]
        self.bosses = [
            {"name": "Weedling", "health": 50, "damage": 25, "image": "Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Corrupted Weedling", "health": 75, "damage": 30, "image": "Corrupted Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Glowing King Weed", "health": 125, "damage": 35, "image": "Glowing King Weed image"}
        ]
        self.encounter_count = 0
        self.used_creatures = []

    def choose_character(self):
        options = list(self.characters.keys()) + ["Exit to Beginning"]
        self.character = random.choice(options)
        if self.character == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        self.health = self.characters[self.character]["health"]
        self.buffs = self.characters[self.character]["buffs"].copy()
        return True

    def choose_option(self, options, prompt=""):
        if "Exit to Beginning" not in options:
            options.append("Exit to Beginning")
        choice = random.choice(options)
        if choice == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        return choice

    def bid_on_pull_box(self):
        options = ["Basic", "Premium", "Deluxe", "Ultimate"]
        box = self.choose_option(options)
        if not box:
            return False
        items = {
            "Basic": [
                "Small Health Pack (restores 5 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+1)",
                "Agility Booster (+1)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+1)",
                "Engineering Booster (+1)",
                "Knife (Basic Weapon)"
            ],
            "Premium": [
                "Medium Health Pack (restores 10 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+2)",
                "Agility Booster (+2)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+2)",
                "Engineering Booster (+2)",
                "Small Critical Hit Amulet (10% chance for double damage)",
                "Pistol (Medium Weapon)"
            ],
            "Deluxe": [
                "Large Health Pack (restores 15 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+3)",
                "Agility Booster (+3)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+3)",
                "Engineering Booster (+3)",
                "Large Critical Hit Amulet (15% chance for double damage)",
                "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)"
            ],
            "Ultimate": [
                "Extra-Large Health Pack (restores 20 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+4)",
                "Agility Booster (+4)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+4)",
                "Engineering Booster (+4)",
                "Epic Critical Hit Amulet (20% chance for double damage)",
                "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"
            ]
        }
        box_items = items[box]
        while True:
            add_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if add_item == "No" or not add_item:
                break
            item = self.choose_option(box_items)
            if not item:
                break
            if item in self.weapons and item in self.inventory:
                continue
            if item in self.weapons:
                weapon_type = item.split()[0]
                if weapon_type == "Knife":
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] = float('inf')  # Knife has infinite ammo
                else:
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] += 1  # Each weapon starts with 1 ammo
            self.inventory.append(item)
            box_items.remove(item)
        return True

    def drop_ammo(self):
        ammo_types = ["Pistol", "Assault Rifle", "Plasma Rifle"]
        ammo_dropped = random.choice(ammo_types)
        ammo_amount = random.randint(1, 10)
        self.ammo[ammo_dropped] += ammo_amount

    def encounter_creature(self):
        self.encounter_count += 1
        if not self.creatures:
            self.creatures = self.used_creatures
            self.used_creatures = []
        creature = random.choice(self.creatures)
        self.creatures.remove(creature)
        self.used_creatures.append(creature)
        return self.combat(creature, rolls_limit=3)

    def encounter_boss(self):
        if not self.bosses:
            return False
        boss = self.bosses.pop(0)
        self.encounter_count = 0  # Reset encounter count after each boss
        rolls_limit = 4 if boss["name"] != "Glowing King Weed" else 5
        return self.boss_combat(boss, rolls_limit)

    def combat(self, creature, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            creature_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > creature_roll:
                damage = player_roll - creature_roll
                creature["damage"] -= damage

            if creature["damage"] <= 0:
                return True

            creature_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense_roll = random.randint(1, 20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if creature_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = creature_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def boss_combat(self, boss, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            boss_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > boss_roll:
                damage = player_roll - boss_roll
                boss["health"] -= damage

            if boss["health"] <= 0:
                return True



[2024-06-01 13:10:19] ChatGPT:
            boss_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense_roll = random.randint(1, 20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if boss_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = boss_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def apply_item_effect(self, item):
        if "Health Pack" in item:
            health_values = {"Small": 5, "Medium": 10, "Large": 15, "Extra-Large": 20}
            health_restored = health_values[item.split()[0]]
            self.health += health_restored
        elif "Booster" in item:
            stat_boost = int(item.split('(')[1].split('+')[1].split(')')[0])
            stat_type = item.split()[0]
            self.buffs[stat_type] += stat_boost
        elif "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
            pass  # Single-use item effect handled during roll

    def start_game(self):
        while True:
            if not self.choose_character():
                continue
            while True:
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                print("Congratulations! You have defeated all bosses and survived the wasteland!")
                break

def run_tests():
    results = []
    for _ in tqdm(range(1000), desc="Running tests"):
        game = WastelandAdventure()
        try:
            game.start_game()
            results.append("Success")
        except Exception as e:
            results.append(f"Error: {str(e)}")
    success_count = results.count("Success")
    error_count = len(results) - success_count
    return {"Success": success_count, "Error": error_count}

# Run the tests in the background
test_results = run_tests()
test_results
```

```python

from tqdm import tqdm

class WastelandAdventure:
    def __init__(self):
        self.characters = {
            "Strong Human": {"health": 150, "buffs": {"Strength": 2, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 8},

        self.health = 0

            {"name": "Corrupted Weedling", "health": 75, "damage": 30, "image": "Corrupted Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Glowing King Weed", "health": 125, "damage": 35, "image": "Glowing King Weed image"}
        ]
        self.encounter_count = 0
        self.used_creatures = []

    def choose_character(self):

        self.character = random.choice(options)

        self.health = self.characters[self.character]["health"]
        self.buffs = self.characters[self.character]["buffs"].copy()

        choice = random.choice(options)
        if choice == "Exit to Beginning":
```

                "Large Health Pack (restores 15 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+3)",
                "Agility Booster (+3)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+3)",
                "Engineering Booster (+3)",
                "Large Critical Hit Amulet (15% chance for double damage)",
                "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)"
            ],
            "Ultimate": [
                "Extra-Large Health Pack (restores 20 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+4)",
                "Agility Booster (+4)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+4)",
                "Engineering Booster (+4)",
                "Epic Critical Hit Amulet (20% chance for double damage)",
                "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"
            ]
        }
        box_items = items[box]
        while True:
            add_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if add_item == "No" or not add_item:
                break
            item = self.choose_option(box_items)
            if not item:
                break
            if item in self.weapons and item in self.inventory:
                continue
            if item in self.weapons:
                weapon_type = item.split()[0]
                if weapon_type == "Knife":
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] = float('inf')  # Knife has infinite ammo
                else:
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] += 1  # Each weapon starts with 1 ammo
            self.inventory.append(item)
            box_items.remove(item)
        return True

    def drop_ammo(self):
        ammo_types = ["Pistol", "Assault Rifle", "Plasma Rifle"]
        ammo_dropped = random.choice(ammo_types)
        ammo_amount = random.randint(1, 10)
        self.ammo[ammo_dropped] += ammo_amount

    def encounter_creature(self):
        self.encounter_count += 1
        if not self.creatures:
            self.creatures = self.used_creatures
            self.used_creatures = []
        creature = random.choice(self.creatures)
        self.creatures.remove(creature)
        self.used_creatures.append(creature)
        return self.combat(creature, rolls_limit=3)

    def encounter_boss(self):
        if not self.bosses:
            return False
        boss = self.bosses.pop(0)
        self.encounter_count = 0  # Reset encounter count after each boss
        rolls_limit = 4 if boss["name"] != "Glowing King Weed" else 5
        return self.boss_combat(boss, rolls_limit)

    def combat(self, creature, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            creature_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > creature_roll:
                damage = player_roll - creature_roll
                creature["damage"] -= damage

            if creature["damage"] <= 0:
                return True

            creature_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense_roll = random.randint(1, 20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if creature_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = creature_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def boss_combat(self, boss, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            boss_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > boss_roll:
                damage = player_roll - boss_roll
                boss["health"] -= damage

            if boss["health"] <= 0:
                return True

            boss_attack_roll = random.randint(1

```python
import random

class WastelandAdventure:
    def __init__(self):
        self.characters = {
            "Strong Human": {"health": 150, "buffs": {"Strength": 2, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 8},
            "Agile Scout": {"health": 120, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 2, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 6},
            "Intelligent Engineer": {"health": 130, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 2, "Engineering": 1}, "inventory_size": 7},
            "Mysterious Medic": {"health": 140, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 1, "Engineering": 2}, "inventory_size": 7}
        }
        self.character = None
        self.health = 0
        self.inventory = []
        self.buffs = {}
        self.ammo = {"Pistol": 0, "Assault Rifle": 0, "Plasma Rifle": 0}
        self.weapons = ["Knife (Basic Weapon)", "Pistol (Medium Weapon)", "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)", "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"]
        self.creatures = [
            {"name": "Small Bug", "damage": 5, "image": "Small Bug image"},
            {"name": "Medium Bug", "damage": 10, "image": "Medium Bug image"},
            {"name": "Large Bug", "damage": 15, "image": "Large Bug image"},
            {"name": "Gatordillo", "damage": 20, "image": "Gatordillo image"},
            {"name": "Feral Ghoul", "damage": 15, "image": "Feral Ghoul image"},
            {"name": "Small Raider", "damage": 10, "image": "Small Raider image"},
            {"name": "Medium Raider", "damage": 15, "image": "Medium Raider image"},
            {"name": "Large Raider", "damage": 20, "image": "Large Raider image"}
        ]
        self.bosses = [
            {"name": "Weedling", "health": 50, "damage": 25, "image": "Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Corrupted Weedling", "health": 75, "damage": 30, "image": "Corrupted Weedling image"},
            {"name": "Glowing King Weed", "health": 125, "damage": 35, "image": "Glowing King Weed image"}
        ]
        self.encounter_count = 0
        self.used_creatures = []

    def choose_character(self):
        options = list(self.characters.keys()) + ["Exit to Beginning"]
        self.character = random.choice(options)
        if self.character == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        self.health = self.characters[self.character]["health"]
        self.buffs = self.characters[self.character]["buffs"].copy()
        return True

    def choose_option(self, options, prompt=""):
        if "Exit to Beginning" not in options:
            options.append("Exit to Beginning")
        choice = random.choice(options)
        if choice == "Exit to Beginning":
            return False
        return choice

    def bid_on_pull_box(self):
        options = ["Basic", "Premium", "Deluxe", "Ultimate"]
        box = self.choose_option(options)
        if not box:
            return False
        items = {
            "Basic": [
                "Small Health Pack (restores 5 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+1)",
                "Agility Booster (+1)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+1)",
                "Engineering Booster (+1)",
                "Knife (Basic Weapon)"
            ],
            "Premium": [
                "Medium Health Pack (restores 10 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+2)",
                "Agility Booster (+2)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+2)",
                "Engineering Booster (+2)",
                "Small Critical Hit Amulet (10% chance for double damage)",
                "Pistol (Medium Weapon)"
            ],
            "Deluxe": [
                "Large Health Pack (restores 15 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+3)",
                "Agility Booster (+3)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+3)",
                "Engineering Booster (+3)",
                "Large Critical Hit Amulet (15% chance for double damage)",
                "Assault Rifle (Powerful Weapon)"
            ],
            "Ultimate": [
                "Extra-Large Health Pack (restores 20 HP)",
                "Strength Booster (+4)",
                "Agility Booster (+4)",
                "Intelligence Booster (+4)",
                "Engineering Booster (+4)",
                "Epic Critical Hit Amulet (20% chance for double damage)",
                "Plasma Rifle (Epic Weapon)"
            ]
        }
        box_items = items[box]
        while True:
            add_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if add_item == "No" or not add_item:
                break
            item = self.choose_option(box_items)
            if not item:
                break
            if item in self.weapons and item in self.inventory:
                continue
            if item in self.weapons:
                weapon_type = item.split()[0]
                if weapon_type == "Knife":
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] = float('inf')  # Knife has infinite ammo
                else:
                    self.ammo[weapon_type] += 1  # Each weapon starts with 1 ammo
            self.inventory.append(item)
            box_items.remove(item)
        return True

    def drop_ammo(self):
        ammo_types = ["Pistol", "Assault Rifle", "Plasma Rifle"]
        ammo_dropped = random.choice(ammo_types)
        ammo_amount = random.randint(1, 10)
        self.ammo[ammo_dropped] += ammo_amount

    def encounter_creature(self):
        self.encounter_count += 1
        if not self.creatures:
            self.creatures = self.used_creatures
            self.used_creatures = []
        creature = random.choice(self.creatures)
        self.creatures.remove(creature)
        self.used_creatures.append(creature)
        return self.combat(creature, rolls_limit=3)

    def encounter_boss(self):
        if not self.bosses:
            return False
        boss = self.bosses.pop(0)
        self.encounter_count = 0  # Reset encounter count after each boss
        rolls_limit = 4 if boss["name"] != "Glowing King Weed" else 5
        return self.boss_combat(boss, rolls_limit)

    def combat(self, creature, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            creature_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > creature_roll:
                damage = player_roll - creature_roll
                creature["damage"] -= damage

            if creature["damage"] <= 0:
                return True

            creature_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player_defense_roll = random.randint(1, 20) + self.buffs["Agility"]
            if creature_attack_roll > player_defense_roll:
                damage = creature_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def boss_combat(self, boss, rolls_limit):
        rolls_left = rolls_limit
        critical_hit_used = False
        while rolls_left > 0:
            rolls_left -= 1
            use_item = self.choose_option(["Yes", "No"])
            if use_item == "No" or not use_item:
                pass
            else:
                item = self.choose_option(self.inventory)
                if not item:
                    return False
                self.apply_item_effect(item)
                if "Health Pack" in item or "Booster" in item or "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                    self.inventory.remove(item)
                    if "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
                        critical_hit_used = True

            player_roll = random.randint(5, 20) + self.buffs["Strength"]
            if critical_hit_used:
                player_roll *= 2
                critical_hit_used = False
            boss_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            if player_roll > boss_roll:
                damage = player_roll - boss_roll
                boss["health"] -= damage

            if boss["health"] <= 0:
                return True

            boss_attack_roll = random.randint(1, 20)
            player

                damage = boss_attack_roll - player_defense_roll
                self.health -= damage

            if self.health <= 0:
                return False

        return True

    def apply_item_effect(self, item):
        if "Health Pack" in item:
            health_values = {"Small": 5, "Medium": 10, "Large": 15, "Extra-Large": 20}
            health_restored = health_values[item.split()[0]]
            self.health += health_restored
        elif "Booster" in item:
            stat_boost = int(item.split('(')[1].split('+')[1].split(')')[0])
            stat_type = item.split()[0]
            self.buffs[stat_type] += stat_boost
        elif "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
            pass  # Single-use item effect handled during roll

    def start_game(self):
        while True:
            if not self.choose_character():
                continue
            while True:
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():

                if not self.encounter_creature():

                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                print("Congratulations! You have defeated all bosses and survived the wasteland!")
                break
```

```python
import random

class WastelandAdventure:
    def __init__(self):
        self.characters = {
            "Strong Human": {"health": 150, "buffs": {"Strength": 2, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 8},
            "Agile Scout": {"health": 120, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 2, "Intelligence": 0, "Engineering": 0}, "inventory_size": 6},
            "Intelligent Engineer": {"health": 130, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 2, "Engineering": 1}, "inventory_size": 7},
            "Mysterious Medic": {"health": 140, "buffs": {"Strength": 0, "Agility": 0, "Intelligence": 1, "Engineering": 2}, "inventory_size": 7}

        if "Health Pack" in item:
            health_values = {"Small": 5, "Medium": 10, "Large": 15, "Extra-Large": 20}
            health_restored = health_values[item.split()[0]]
            self.health += health_restored
        elif "Booster" in item:
            stat_boost = int(item.split('(')[1].split('+')[1].split(')')[0])
            stat_type = item.split()[0]
            self.buffs[stat_type] += stat_boost
        elif "Critical Hit Amulet" in item:
            pass  # Single-use item effect handled during roll

    def start_game(self):
        while True:
            if not self.choose_character():
                continue
            while True:
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_creature():
                    break
                if not self.bid_on_pull_box():
                    break
                if not self.encounter_boss():
                    break
                print("Congratulations! You have defeated all bosses and survived the wasteland!")
                break

game = WastelandAdventure()
game.start_game()
```
